nodes.documentation:
@title OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy
@dev This contract combines an upgradeability proxy with basic authorization control functionalities
nodes.name: OwnedUpgradeabilityProxy
ProxyOwnershipTransferred

nodes.documentation:
@dev This event will be emitted every time the implementation gets upgraded
@param implementation representing the address of the upgraded implementation
nodes.name: Upgraded

nodes.documentation:
@dev Upgrades the implementation address
@param implementation representing the address of the new implementation to be set
nodes.name: _upgradeTo

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyProxyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Tells the address of the proxy owner
@return the address of the proxy owner
nodes.name: proxyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferProxyOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the upgradeability owner to upgrade the current implementation of the proxy.
@param implementation representing the address of the new implementation to be set.
nodes.name: upgradeTo
upgradeToAndCall
